commit.message:
Rollup merge of #58370 - nox:relax-bounds, r=dtolnay

Relax some Hash bounds on HashMap<K, V, S> and HashSet<T, S>

Notably, hash iterators don't require any trait bounds to be iterated.

Rollup merge of #58370 - nox:relax-bounds, r=dtolnay

Relax some Hash bounds on HashMap<K, V, S> and HashSet<T, S>

Notably, hash iterators don't require any trait bounds to be iterated.
